``` {r spectro}
my_wave <- read_sound_file(here("output", "wav", "SPP-1N_48c_20250603_183902_LFRR.wav"))
              

scrolling_spectro(
  wave = my_wave,
  wl = 600,
  t.display = 3,
  ovlp = 95,
  pal = cividis,
  grid = FALSE,
  flim = c(2, 8),
  width = 700,
  height = 250,
  res = 100,
  collevels = seq(-40, 0, 5),
  file.name = "my_dynamic_spectro.mp4",
  colbg = "#2d2d86",
  lcol = "#FFFFFFE6"
)
```
